content: Maybe they're just happy someone cares about them and is going to reduce the amount of time they have to spend away from their families. Unlike the last administration which was all about "staying the course"... Of all escape mechanisms, Death is the most efficient. ~~ H.L. Mencken

content: I noticed that 99% of the soldiers standing behind POTUS on teh podium were minorities. Wonder whY? The thign that pizzes me off, was all teh rhetoric POTUS said about how proud he is, blah,blah,blah, is all BS. This is the guy who claimed we air raid villages, tried stopping funding for our troops, put up raod blocks to victory at every turn. Now he wants us to beleive he cares? SOrry, I don't think he does, he's another slick politician, full of rhetoric, and short on knowledge.

content: I noticed that 99% of the soldiers standing behind POTUS on teh podium were minorities. Wonder whY? The thign that pizzes me off, was all teh rhetoric POTUS said about how proud he is, blah,blah,blah, is all BS. This is the guy who claimed we air raid villages, tried stopping funding for our troops, put up raod blocks to victory at every turn. Now he wants us to beleive he cares? SOrry, I don't think he does, he's another slick politician, full of rhetoric, and short on knowledge.

content: I'll give him credit, this was a great reception for Obama! Now we'll see if it was just a "flash in the pan", or a sustainable response from the troops. The winds may be blowing in the opposite direction when these same troops are relocated to A-Stan! Time will tell.
